Question
========

Complete the following statements.

Other conditions being equal, the higher the reliability (*confidence level*), the ... the confidence interval (BI).

If the number of observations increases, then the BI becomes ... . 
Answerlist
----------
* Narrower, wider
* Wider, wider
* Narrower, narrower
* Wider, narrower

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
